DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy of an advice with a weekly divided drug delivery, compared to an usual monthly delivery in the prevention of voluntary drug intoxications repeated.
DOC.mesh_term: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions
DOC.criteria: Men and women between 18 and 65 years. Hospitalized after a voluntary drug intoxication. History of two voluntary drug intoxications at least. Person registered for social security. Signed free consent. Patients under treatment for opiate split Acute or chronicgoing wild. Cognitive problems hindering understanding of questionnaires Persons targeted by articles L11215 to L11218 of CSP
